name: Jelly Fighters
description:
Single player or Two player versus game, collect food to grow and attack opponents to shrink them. Absorb opponents when they are half your size. Careful, the bigger you are the weaker and slower your attacks are. Press F1 in-game to see controls.

Bugs: you can get stuck in walls fairly often due to the growing, just press F2 to restart the game because I didnt make time to fix it
